data.eml:eml: A new species of Dystacta Saussure, 1871 from Nyungwe National Park, Rwanda (Insecta, Mantodea, Dystactinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tedrow, Riley, Nathan, Kabanguka, Richard, Nasasira, Svenson, Gavin J (2014): A new species of Dystacta Saussure, 1871 from Nyungwe National Park, Rwanda (Insecta, Mantodea, Dystactinae). ZooKeys 410: 1-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.410.7053, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.410.7053
